name: Cave Diver
description:
Play as a old prospector trying to find his fortune by exploring deep caves and mines. Go deeper than any other prospector before, avoid fallen rocks and low hanging lanterns, collect gold along the way and attempt to find the rumored room of gold!

Though be careful, upon entering the cave you triggered a slight cave-in and now being chased by an unstoppable boulder, so make sure to not get slowed down too much or else you might never get to see that gold!

Made for a three week game jam at our college.

CONTROLS

Up Arrow  = Jump

Down Arrow = Duck

Jump over obstacles blocking the tracks and duck under the low hanging lanterns.

Install instructions

- Download CaveDiver.zip

- Extract all from zip file

- Run Cave Diver Application

- Start playing! Tell us what you think in the comments!
